{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"Rowコントロールのプロパティである","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":true,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"controls","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"に、横並びにしたい複数のコントロールを","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":true,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"リスト型","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"で設定することで、上記のようなウィンドウを表示することができます。","href":null}]}

```python
import flet as ft

def main(page: ft.Page):
    icon = ft.Icon(
        name=ft.icons.DRIVE_FILE_RENAME_OUTLINE,
        size=38,
    )
    field = ft.TextField(
        label="名前を入力",
        height=43,
        expand=1,
    )
    button = ft.FilledButton(
        text="送信",
        height=40,
    )

    row = ft.Row(controls=[icon, field, button])

    page.add(row)

ft.app(target=main)
```

{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"もちろん、このRowコントロールも設定できるプロパティを複数持っており、コントロールごとの間隔を設定できる","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":true,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"spacing","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"や、横並びにしたときの幅を設定する","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":true,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"width","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"などがあります。","href":null}]}

```python
import flet as ft

def main(page: ft.Page):
    icon = ft.Icon(
        name=ft.icons.DRIVE_FILE_RENAME_OUTLINE,
        size=38,
    )
    field = ft.TextField(
        label="名前を入力",
        height=43,
        expand=1,
    )
    button = ft.FilledButton(
        text="送信",
        height=40,
    )

    row = ft.Row(
        controls=[icon, field, button],
        spacing=40,
        width=400,
    )

    page.add(row)

ft.app(target=main)
```

{"parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"ft.Column","href":null}],"color":"default","is_toggleable":false}

{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"これには、","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":true,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"Columコントロール","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"を使用します。","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":true,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"Columnコントロール","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"の使用方法は、先程のRowコントロールとよく似ています。","href":null}]}

{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":true,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"controls","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"プロパティに、縦並びにしたい複数のコントロールを","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":true,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"リスト型","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"で指定します。","href":null}]}

```python
import flet as ft

def main(page: ft.Page):
    icon = ft.Icon(
        name=ft.icons.DRIVE_FILE_RENAME_OUTLINE,
        size=38,
    )
    field = ft.TextField(
        label="名前を入力",
        height=43,
    )
    button = ft.FilledButton(
        text="送信",
        height=40,
    )

    column = ft.Column(controls=[icon, field, button])

    page.add(column)

ft.app(target=main)
```

```python
import flet as ft

def main(page: ft.Page):
    datepicker = ft.DatePicker(
    )

    row1 = ft.Row(
        controls=[
            ft.Icon(name=ft.icons.DRIVE_FILE_RENAME_OUTLINE, size=40),
            ft.TextField(label="名前", height=55, expand=1),
            ft.FilledButton(text="送信", height=40),
        ]
    )
    row2 = ft.RadioGroup(
        content=ft.Row(
            controls=[
                ft.Radio(value="first", label="１回生", expand=1),
                ft.Radio(value="second", label="２回生", expand=1),
                ft.Radio(value="third", label="３回生", expand=1),
                ft.Radio(value="fourth", label="４回生", expand=1),
            ]
        )
    )
    row3 = ft.Row(
        controls=[
            ft.Text(value="学部", width=50, text_align="CENTER"),
            ft.Dropdown(
                options=[
                    ft.dropdown.Option(text="先端理工学部"),
                    ft.dropdown.Option(text="農学部"),
                    ft.dropdown.Option(text="社会学部"),
                ],
                height=55,
                expand=1,
            )
        ]
    )
    row4 = ft.Row(
        controls=[
            ft.Text(value="誕生日", width=50, text_align="CENTER"),
            ft.Dropdown(
                options=[ft.dropdown.Option(option) for option in range(2024,1900,-1)],
                label="年",
                expand=3,
            ),
            ft.Dropdown(
                options=[ft.dropdown.Option(option) for option in range(1,13)],
                label="月",
                expand=2,
            ),
            ft.Dropdown(
                options=[ft.dropdown.Option(option) for option in range(1,32)],
                label="日",
                expand=2,
            ),
        ]
    )
    row5 = ft.Row(
        controls=[
            ft.Text(value="キッカケ", expand=1),
            ft.Checkbox(label="Twitter", value=False, expand=1),
            ft.Checkbox(label="Instagram", value=False, expand=1),
            ft.Checkbox(label="ビラ", value=False, expand=1),
            ft.Checkbox(label="その他", value=False, expand=1),
        ]
    )
    
    column = ft.Column(controls=[row1, row2, row3, row4, row5])

    page.add(column)

ft.app(target=main)
```
